rationale: Mentions dizziness occurs after morning amlodipine and that breakfast is often only coffee, but omits frequency, severity, and scaffold-related timing.
Only implicit link between amlodipine and dizziness; no explicit assessment section or differential given.
Plan advises larger breakfast but lacks BP monitoring, dose/timing adjustment, or follow-up instructions.
No occupational safety instructions about avoiding scaffold work when dizzy.
Note is brief and avoids unrelated chart data; documentation is largely concise.
No vitals recorded or orthostatic measurement plan despite lightheadedness complaint, fully triggering this penalty.
Continues amlodipine without monitoring or dose change; only suggests bigger breakfast, so unsafe management penalty applies.
